      static Throwable rootOf(Throwable t)
      Returns the root cause of the specified throwable.

      Returns the stack trace of the root cause of t as a string.
      static RuntimeException smash(Throwable t)
      Returns t if it already is a RuntimeException, else a RuntimeException wrapping t.
